appendix.title: Resumé of the Twelve Deeds
appendix.paragraph: # Leaves Tushita paradise to come to our world, after fivefold vision. # Enters mother’s womb, i.e. chooses royal family. # Born without causing pain. # Grows up an exceptionally accomplished child. # Marries and enjoys the company of his consorts. # Renounces worldliness. # Practises meditation and asceticism. # Ends asceticism and sets out for Vajrasana. # Defeats the hosts of Mara. # Manifests total enlightenment. # Turns the wheel of dharma. # Passes into _parinirvana_.
